headline: Parker-Hannifin Expands Electrification Portfolio With Curtis Acquisition
summary: PH acquires Curtis in a $1B deal to boost electrification offerings and expand in material handling and off-highway markets.

headline: General Industrial Machinery Stocks Q2 Results: Benchmarking Dover (NYSE:DOV)
summary: Let’s dig into the relative performance of Dover (NYSE:DOV) and its peers as we unravel the now-completed Q2 general industrial machinery earnings season.
